title: foxglove.MarkerDeletion
description: Command to remove previously published markers

timestamp.title: time
timestamp.description: Timestamp of the marker. Only matching markers earlier than this timestamp will be deleted.

type.title: foxglove.MarkerDeletionType
type.description: Type of deletion action to perform

namespace.description: Namespace which must match if `kind` is `MATCHING_NAMESPACE_AND_ID` or `MATCHING_NAMESPACE`.

id.description: Numeric identifier which must match if `kind` is `MATCHING_NAMESPACE_AND_ID`.
